text: On 6 May 2023, a fire started in the La Esperanza gold mine in Yanaquihua District, Condesuyos Province, Peru. It killed at least 27 people. The fire was the country's deadliest mining accident since 2000. ==References== Category:2023 fires Category:2023 in South America Category:May 2023 events Category:2020s in Peru Category:Arequipa Region
title: 2023 Yanaquihua gold mine fire
